ygData.subject: RE: [archive-crawler] Intermittent issue running Heritrix with Java 7
ygData.msgSnippet: I haven t heard anything about a fix. I also never heard of anyone reproducing the issue. I m planning on running some test crawls with Java 8 and the latest
